Title: Probability I
Topics: Course Introduction; Probability Measures;  Random Variables (RVs); PDFs, PMFs, and CDFs; Expectation

Title: Probabilty II
Topics: MGFs; Joint and conditional distributions; Simulating random variables

Title: Convergence I
Topics: Convergence in probability; Convergence in distribution; Lp convergence; Convergence relationships

Title: Convergence II
Topics: Convergence of functions of RVs; Taylor's theorem; Delta method

Title: Statistical Models and Inference
Topics: Parametric and nonparmetric models; Goals of inference; Inferential frameworks
Recommended Resources: Knight Chp 4; Davison Chps 1 and 2; Lehmann Chp 4

Title: Nonparametric Estimation
Topics: Statistical functionals; Substitution Principle + Method of Moments;  Bootstrap
Recommended Resources: Knight Chp 4; Davison Chps 1 and 2; Lehmann Chps 4 and 6

Title: Likelihoood I
Topics: Likelihood function; Likelihood principle; Asymptotic theory

Title: Likelihood II
Topics: Misspecified Models; Numerical computation of MLEs
